entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -8.0°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 8.
